resources.string: We have sent you an email to reset your password. It may take some time for the email to arrive.

You cannot enter more than 256 characters.

Please enter a valid email address.

This email address is already in use with a Philips account or a social media account.\nPlease go back to the \'Log in\' step, or use an other email address.
Please verify your email address through the activation link sent to your email account
We have sent an email to: %s. It may take some time for the email to arrive.
Please enter your Philips password to merge your account.
Press “Resend” button if you have not received an email.
No worries! You do not need a Philips password. You have logged in with a social provider previously.
Sorry to make you click twice. You have previously logged in with a social provider. Please go back to the Log in-step’, and log in with your social provider.
Protect your privacy by choosing a strong password.
I would like to receive periodic offers and updates from philips
You have used %s before for creating a Philips account.
Previously, you logged in with %s, using %s on a Philips app or website. We will connect %s to your account.
To make sure it is really you, please log in with %s once more.
If you would not like to connect %s to your account, press \”cancel\” and log in with %s.
We have sent an email to: %s
It may take some time for the email to arrive.
Please check your email to activate your account.

Having problems?
- It may take some time for the verification email to arrive
- Look in your spam folder as well
- Press the "Resend" button below if you did not receive the verification email

We have sent an email. It may take some time for the email to arrive.

Please check your email to activate your account.

You can use the app in the meantime.
By creating an account or signing in you certify that you are %s years or older.\n
We have sent you an email to verify your email address. It may take some time for the email to arrive.
We will send you an email to reset your password.

As a result of your consent, Philips group companies may contact you with promotional communications - based on your preferences and behaviour - about Philips products, services, events and promotions. 
We may contact you via email, SMS and other digital channels, such as mobile apps and social media. To be able to tailor the communications to your preferences and behavior and provide you with the best, personalized experience, we may analyze and combine your personal data. 

This data may include:
Data that you want to actively share with us such as: your name, date of birth or age, email address, physical address, country, gender, phone number, social media profile.\n\n
Data we get from your interactions with Philips:\n

Data about your interactions and usage of the Philips digital channels, such as social media, websites, email, apps and connected products. This data may include: IP address. cookies, device information, communications you click on, location details, and websites you visit
Philips will give you the opportunity to withdraw your consent at any time.
Do you want to access more account settings?\nVisit %s via your browser.
Receive Philips\' promotional communications based on my preferences and online behavior\n%s
Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later
Your email is already verified. You may continue.
This is not a phone number I can recognize. Please double-check. \nIf you\'re in a different country, you may have to change your country settings .
Having Problems?\n- It may take some time for the SMS with the code to arrive\n- If you did not receive an SMS when the countdown clock ends, press the \'Resend\' button
We have sent an SMS with a code to your phone, please enter this code to log in.
The verification code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
Are you sure you want to log out? You\'ll have limited access to the app while logged out.

The verification code you entered is incorrect. Please try again or hit resend to receive a new code via SMS.

Help us get in touch with you if there’s unusual activity in your account or you accidentally get locked out. Don’t worry we’ll only use this info if we need to reach you about your account.

Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases. Tailored for you!

Password must have at least 8 characters with a mix of letters (A-Z, a-z), digits(0-9) and/or symbols (_.@$).
Subscribe to our newsletter to receive exclusive promotions and coupons and be the first to know about new products
To be able to complete your login and verify that you are a real person, we need an email address or mobile number.
You’ve logged in before using %s on a Philips app or website. We can also link this social login to your account.
To do this, please log in again using %s.
You’ve used %s before to create a Philips account.
Would you like to merge your accounts?
If you do not want to link your social media account to your account, log out and then log in again using your Philips account details.
It may take some time for the SMS with the code to arrive.
Check if your phone number is correct and press the resend button when the timer ends.

Please enter the code to activate your account.
I did not receive an SMS
In case we need to reach you about unusual activity on your account or to reset your password if you get locked out, please add your email here.
Please enter the code to reset your account password.

As a result of your consent, Philips group companies may contact you with promotional communications via email, SMS and other digital channels, such as mobile apps and social media. To be able to tailor the communications to your preferences and behavior and provide you with the best, personalized experience, we may analyze and combine your personal data. This data may include: 

Data you give us
Data that you want to actively share with us such as: your name, date of birth or age, email address, physical address, country, gender, phone number, social media profile.

Data we get from your interactions with Philips
Data about your interactions and usage of the Philips digital channels, such as social media, websites, emails, apps and connected products. This data may include: IP address, cookies, device information, communications you click on, location details, and websites you visit

Philips will give you the opportunity to withdraw your consent at any time.
For more information, please read the Philips Privacy notice and the Philips Cookie notice.
To be able to complete your login and verify that you are a real person, we need a mobile number.
To be able to complete your login and verify that you are a real person, we need an email address.
